陊字的基本解释

陊
duò
古同“堕”：“程巧致功，期不陁陊。”
败坏；破败。
山崩。

陊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duò］
［《廣韻》徒可切，上哿，定。］
［《廣韻》池爾切，上紙，澄。］
(1)崩塌。
(2)坠落。
(3)引申为落入，陷进。
(4)败坏。
(5)破败。

陊字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　陊； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1349第06
【廣韻】徒可切【集韻】待可切，?音舵。【玉篇】壞也。【廣韻】下坂貌。又落也。【于逖·聞奇錄】徐知業少時遊天台山，歇於大樹隂，巖上石盤欲陊。空中語曰：下有人，石矻然架樹，回身乃落，震地堛然。【又】楊集收復睦州，至一巖下，忽一大石盤陊下。【集韻】本作阤。亦作陀。　又【玉篇】小?也。　又【唐韻】徒果切【集韻】杜果切，?音垜。【說文】亦落也。【註】俗作墮，非。【集韻】或作隓?。　又【廣韻】池爾切【集韻】丈爾切，?音豸。【廣韻】山?也。【集韻】本作阤。或作陁。

陊字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
陊字的起名意思

暂无。

陊
Basic explanation of words
陊
duò
Gu Tong's "fallen": "Cheng Qiao made merit, and the expectation is not too late."
Corrupt; dilapidated.
Landslide.
陊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duò］
["Guangyun" can only be cut, go on, and set. ]
["Guangyun" Chi Erqie, on paper, clear. ]
(1) Collapse.
(2) Falling.
(3) The extension is to fall into, sink into.
(4) Corruption.
(5) Dilapidated.
陊

【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　陊; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1349 Page 06
[Guang Yun] Can be cut only after [Ji Yun] Wait to be cut,? Tone rudder. [Jade articles] Bad too. [Guangyun] Xiaban appearance. Fall again. [Yu Ti·Wen Qi Lu] Xu Zhiye traveled Tiantai Mountain in his youth, resting in the shade of the big trees, and eager to go on the rock on the rock. The sky said: There are people underneath, and the stone is standing up and the tree is standing up, but turning back and falling, shaking the ground. [Also] Yang Ji recovered Muzhou, to Yiyanxia, and suddenly a large Shipanque. [Ji Yun] This is a ban. Also known as Tuo.　[Jade articles] Xiao? Yeah.　[Tang Yun] Tu Guoqie [Jiyun] Du Guoqie,? Yin 垜. [Said the text] also fell. [Note] The vulgar is depraved, not. [Ji Yun] Or Zuo Xuan?.　[Guangyun] Chi Erqie [Jiyun] Zhang Erqie,? Yinzhe. [Guang Yun] Mountain? Also. [Ji Yun] This is a ban. Or Zuo.
